label: 御領
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: Lands held by some especially prominent family or institution. Thus Kantō goryō were estates held in proprietorship by the Kamakura Bakufu, and denka goryō were domains belonging to the regent's line of the Fujiwara.　[殿下御領]
